virtual|fans|userregistry: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying each fan record (e.g., 'FAN001').
virtual|fans|nicklabel: A VARCHAR(100) storing the fan's chosen nickname or handle.
virtual|fans|regmoment: A DATE noting when the fan first registered (e.g., '2025-02-15').
virtual|fans|tierstep: A SMALLINT that captures the fan's level or tier progression (e.g., 1, 2, 3).
virtual|fans|ptsval: An INT holding the fan's accumulated points or score within the system.
virtual|fans|statustag: An enum (FanStatus_enum) describing the fan’s current status (Inactive, VIP, Active, Blocked).
virtual|virtualidols|entityreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key uniquely identifying the virtual idol (e.g., 'IDOL001').
virtual|virtualidols|nametag: A VARCHAR(100) for the idol’s name or stage name.
virtual|virtualidols|kindtag: An enum (IdolType_enum) describing the idol's nature (2D, AI Generated, 3D, Mixed Reality).
virtual|virtualidols|debdate: A DATE for the idol's debut (e.g., '2023-06-01').
virtual|virtualidols|assocgroup: A VARCHAR(100) naming the idol's company or group affiliation.
virtual|virtualidols|genretag: An enum (IdolGenre_enum) indicating the idol’s main genre (Electronic, Dance, Pop, Traditional, Rock).
virtual|virtualidols|primlang: A VARCHAR(50) referencing the idol's primary performance language (e.g., 'English').
virtual|interactions|activityreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for each interaction record (e.g., 'ACT001').
virtual|interactions|timemark: A TIMESTAMP indicating when the interaction occurred.
virtual|interactions|interactfanpivot: A VARCHAR(20) FK referencing Fans(UserRegistry), indicating which fan was involved.
virtual|interactions|interactidolpivot: A VARCHAR(20) FK referencing VirtualIdols(EntityReg), showing which idol was involved.
virtual|interactions|actkind: An enum (InteractionType_enum) describing the action (Vote, Comment, Share, Gift, Live Stream).
virtual|interactions|actplat: An enum (InteractionPlatform_enum) for the platform used (YouTube, Twitter, Official App, TikTok).
virtual|interactions|platused: An enum (PlatformUsed_enum) describing the device platform (Tablet, Mobile, Console, PC).
virtual|interactions|devtype: An enum (DeviceType_enum) specifying the device type (Windows, iOS, Android, Mac).
virtual|interactions|appver: A VARCHAR(20) capturing the version of the app used (e.g., 'v2.3.1').
virtual|interactions|giftfreq: An enum (GiftSendingFrequency_enum) capturing how often gifts are sent (Often, Rarely, Never, Frequent).
virtual|interactions|gifttot: An INT total count of gifts sent during this session/interaction (e.g., 3).
virtual|interactions|giftvalusd: A DECIMAL(10,2) total USD value of gifts (e.g., 15.50).
virtual|interactions|favgifttag: An enum (FavoriteGiftType_enum) for the fan’s preferred gift type (Limited, Custom, Premium, Standard).
virtual|membershipandspending|memberreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for membership & spending records (e.g., 'MEM001').
virtual|membershipandspending|membkind: An enum (MembershipType_enum) describing membership tier (Free, Basic, Diamond, Premium).
virtual|membershipandspending|membdays: A SMALLINT capturing how many days the fan has been a member (e.g., 120).
virtual|membershipandspending|spendfreq: An enum (SpendingFrequency_enum) for spending pattern (Occasional, Weekly, Monthly, Daily).
virtual|membershipandspending|paymethod: An enum (PaymentMethod_enum) indicating how the fan pays (Credit Card, Mobile Payment, PayPal, Crypto).
virtual|engagement|engagereg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for engagement records (e.g., 'ENG001').
virtual|engagement|actfreq: An enum (InteractionFrequency_enum) for how often interactions occur (Weekly, Monthly, Occasional, Daily).
virtual|engagement|peaktime: An enum (PeakActivityTime_enum) describing the highest activity period (Afternoon, Evening, Night, Morning).
virtual|engagement|actdayswk: A SMALLINT number of days per week the fan is active (e.g., 5).
virtual|engagement|avgsesscount: A SMALLINT average number of sessions per day/week (e.g., 3).
virtual|engagement|contpref: An enum (ContentPreference_enum) capturing the fan's preferred content (Music, Dance, Gaming, Chat).
virtual|engagement|langpref: An enum (ContentLanguagePreference_enum) for content language (Both, Original, Translated).
virtual|engagement|transuse: An enum (TranslationUsage_enum) describing translation usage (Always, Sometimes, Never).
virtual|commerceandcollection|commercere: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for commerce/collection records (e.g., 'COM001').
virtual|commerceandcollection|merchbuy: A SMALLINT tally of merchandise purchases (e.g., 5).
virtual|commerceandcollection|merchspend: A DECIMAL(10,2) total spent on merchandise in USD (e.g., 120.00).
virtual|commerceandcollection|digown: An INT indicating how many digital items the fan owns (e.g., 20).
virtual|commerceandcollection|physown: An INT indicating how many physical items the fan owns (e.g., 10).
virtual|commerceandcollection|collcompra: A DECIMAL(5,1) measuring the fan’s collection completion percentage (e.g., '75.5').
virtual|commerceandcollection|tradelevel: An enum (TradingActivityLevel_enum) describing the fan’s trading or exchange activity (High, Low, Medium).
virtual|socialcommunity|socialreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for social community records (e.g., 'SOC001').
virtual|socialcommunity|collabcount: A SMALLINT measuring how many collaborations the fan participated in (e.g., 3).
virtual|eventsandclub|eventsreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for events & club records (e.g., 'EVC001').
virtual|eventsandclub|clubjdate: A DATE the fan joined the club (if applicable).
virtual|loyaltyandachievements|loyaltyre: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for loyalty & achievements (e.g., 'LOY001').
virtual|loyaltyandachievements|rankpos: An INT rank position among all fans (e.g., 120).
virtual|loyaltyandachievements|inflscore: A DECIMAL(5,2) measuring influencer or leadership potential (e.g., '85.50').
virtual|loyaltyandachievements|reputelv: An enum (ReputationLevel_enum) describing the fan’s reputation (Respected, Elite, New, Established).
virtual|loyaltyandachievements|trustval: A DECIMAL(4,1) representing trust or reliability score (e.g., '9.2').
virtual|moderationandcompliance|modreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for moderation records (e.g., 'MOD001').
virtual|moderationandcompliance|rptcount: A SMALLINT count of how many times the fan was reported (e.g., 2).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|warncoun: A SMALLINT count of how many warnings were issued to the fan (e.g., 1).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|violhist: An enum (ViolationHistory_enum) describing any prior infractions (Major, Minor).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|modstat: An enum (ModerationStatus_enum) showing moderation status (Warning, Good Standing, Restricted).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|contcomp: An enum (ContentCompliance_enum) for compliance with content policy (Warning, Violation, Compliant).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|ageverif: An enum (AgeVerification_enum) indicating age verification state (Not Required, Verified, Pending).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|payverif: An enum (PaymentVerification_enum) verifying payment info (Pending, Verified).
virtual|moderationandcompliance|idverif: A VARCHAR(50) capturing any identity verification code or status (e.g., 'IDCheck#123').
virtual|preferencesandsettings|prefreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for preferences/settings (e.g., 'PREF001').
virtual|preferencesandsettings|privset: An enum (PrivacySettings_enum) for privacy level (Private, Friends Only, Public).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|dsconsent: An enum (DataSharingConsent_enum) capturing how much data the fan consents to share (Partial, Minimal, Full).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|notifpref: An enum (NotifPref_enum) describing notifications setting (Important, All).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|commpref: An enum (CommPref_enum) for communication method (SMS, Email, Push).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|markpref: An enum (MarkPref_enum) describing marketing preference (Opted In, Selective, Opted Out).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|langset: An enum (LangSet_enum) specifying how language is handled (Translated, Auto, Original).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|accessset: An enum (AccessSet_enum) describing access or UI customization (Standard, Custom, Enhanced).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|devcount: A SMALLINT number of devices the fan uses with the service (e.g., 2).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|logfreq: An enum (LoginFrequency_enum) for login frequency (Rare, Monthly, Weekly, Daily).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|lastlogdt: A DATE indicating last login date (e.g., '2025-03-15').
virtual|preferencesandsettings|timehrs: An INT representing total hours spent online (e.g., 120).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|avgdailym: A SMALLINT average daily minutes used (e.g., 45).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|peaksess: A SMALLINT peak number of concurrent sessions (e.g., 3).
virtual|preferencesandsettings|platstabl: A DECIMAL(3,2) rating platform stability from the user’s perspective (0.00–1.00) (e.g., '0.90').
virtual|preferencesandsettings|connqual: An enum (ConnectionQuality_enum) describing connectivity (Poor, Excellent, Good, Fair).
virtual|supportandfeedback|supportreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for support/feedback records (e.g., 'SUP001').
virtual|supportandfeedback|techissuerpt: A SMALLINT number of technical issues reported (e.g., 2).
virtual|supportandfeedback|supptix: A SMALLINT how many support tickets the fan opened (e.g., 1).
virtual|supportandfeedback|fbsubs: A SMALLINT count of feedback submissions (e.g., 3).
virtual|supportandfeedback|survpart: An enum (SurveyParticipation_enum) describing survey participation (Never, Active, Occasional).
virtual|supportandfeedback|betapart: An enum (BetaTestingParticipation_enum) for beta test participation (Former, Yes, No).
virtual|supportandfeedback|featreqsubs: A SMALLINT how many feature requests the fan submitted (e.g., 1).
virtual|supportandfeedback|bugsubs: A SMALLINT how many bug reports the fan submitted (e.g., 0).
virtual|supportandfeedback|npsval: A SMALLINT Net Promoter Score value (e.g., 9).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|retreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for retention/influence records (e.g., 'RET001').
virtual|retentionandinfluence|churnflag: An enum (ChurnRisk_enum) capturing churn risk (High, Medium, Low, None).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|reactcount: A SMALLINT how many times the fan reactivated after inactivity (e.g., 2).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|refcount: A SMALLINT number of referrals the fan made (e.g., 3).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|contreach: An INT measuring content reach or audience size (e.g., 500).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|viralcont: A SMALLINT how many viral posts or content pieces the fan created (e.g., 1).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|trendpart: A SMALLINT times the fan participated in trending topics or challenges (e.g., 4).
virtual|retentionandinfluence|hashuse: A SMALLINT count of hashtags the fan used (e.g., 10).
virtual|additionalnotes|notesreg: A VARCHAR(20) primary key for additional notes records (e.g., 'NOTE001').
virtual|additionalnotes|noteinfo: A TEXT field storing any free-form notes or remarks about the fan.

virtual|fans|personal_attributes.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups personal demographic and interest-related attributes of the fan, including age, gender, location, language preference, occupation, and interests.

demographics.agecount: A SMALLINT representing the fan’s age in years.
demographics.gendertype: An enum (FanGender_enum) indicating the fan’s gender (Other, Male, Undisclosed, Female).
demographics.locnation: A VARCHAR(100) for the fan’s country location (e.g., 'USA', 'Japan').
demographics.loctown: A VARCHAR(100) for the fan’s city or town location.

preferences.langpref: An enum (FanLang_enum) specifying the fan's main language (Multiple, Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese).
preferences.occupath: An enum (FanOccupation_enum) describing the fan’s occupation (Professional, Student, Other, Creative).
preferences.interestset: An enum (FanInterests_enum) indicating the fan's primary interest area (Technology, Anime, Art, Music, Gaming).

virtual|interactions|engagement_metrics.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures metrics related to fan engagement during interactions, such as session duration, live attendance, watch hours, and chat activity.

session.sessdurmin: A SMALLINT measuring session duration in minutes (e.g., 45).
session.liveatt: A SMALLINT counting how many live stream attendances happened in this session.
session.watchhrs: A DECIMAL(6,1) specifying how many hours of content the fan watched (e.g., 2.5).

chat_activity.chatmsg: An INT tally of messages sent in chat (e.g., 30).
chat_activity.chatlang: An enum (ChatLang_enum) describing chat language usage (Mixed, Translation, English, Native).
chat_activity.msgtone: An enum (MessageSentiment_enum) indicating the sentiment (Negative, Positive, Neutral).
chat_activity.emojicount: An INT number of emoji used by the fan (e.g., 10).
chat_activity.stkcount: An INT number of stickers used (e.g., 2).

virtual|loyaltyandachievements|reward_pr.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates data related to the fan’s loyalty rewards and achievements, including points, tier, badges, and special titles.

loyalty.loypts: An INT storing loyalty points earned (e.g., 2500).
loyalty.rewtier: An enum (RewardTier_enum) for the reward tier (Bronze, Platinum, Gold, Silver).

achievements.achcount: An INT number of achievements unlocked (e.g., 5).
achievements.badgecoll: An INT count of badges collected by the fan (e.g., 3).
achievements.spectitles: An INT how many special titles the fan holds (e.g., 1).

virtual|eventsandclub|participation_summ.column_meaning: JSONB column. Summarizes fan participation in events and fan club activities, including event attendance, voting participation, and club contribution level.

event_attendance.evtpart: An enum (EventParticipation_enum) describing event participation (Regular, Rare, Always, Never).
event_attendance.offevtatt: A SMALLINT capturing how many offline events the fan attended (e.g., 2).
event_attendance.onevtatt: A SMALLINT capturing how many online events the fan attended (e.g., 5).
event_attendance.meetatt: A SMALLINT counting meet-and-greet or fan meeting attendance (e.g., 1).
event_attendance.concatt: A SMALLINT capturing concert attendance (e.g., 0 for none).

engagement.votepartrate: A DECIMAL(4,1) measuring how often the fan participates in voting (e.g., '75.0').
engagement.camppart: An enum (CampaignParticipation_enum) for participation in idol or brand campaigns (Selective, All, Active).

club.clubstat: An enum (FanClubStatus_enum) describing fan club membership (Non-member, Premium, Elite, Basic).
club.clubcontrib: An enum (FanClubContribution_enum) capturing the fan’s contribution level (Medium, Outstanding, Low, High).

virtual|socialcommunity|community_engage.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups metrics related to the fan’s social network and community contributions, including network size, roles, and content creation activities.

network.socnetsz: An INT capturing the size of the fan's social network (e.g., 500).
network.follcount: An INT indicating how many followers the fan has (e.g., 300).
network.fingcount: An INT indicating how many accounts the fan follows (e.g., 250).
network.friendcon: An INT number of direct friend connections (e.g., 75).

group_involvement.grprole: An enum (GroupRole_enum) showing the fan's role (Member, Leader, Moderator).

content_creation.commcontrib: An enum (CommunityContribution_enum) indicating how much the fan contributes (Low, High, Medium).
content_creation.contcreatestat: An enum (ContentCreationStatus_enum) capturing the fan’s creation level (Active, Occasional).
content_creation.artsubs: An INT counting art submissions by the fan (e.g., 4).
content_creation.ficsubs: An INT counting fan fiction submissions (e.g., 2).
content_creation.coverperfcnt: An INT number of cover performances (e.g., 1).
content_creation.ugcval: An INT measuring user-generated content volume (e.g., 30 posts).
content_creation.contqualrate: A DECIMAL(3,1) rating the overall quality of the fan’s content (e.g., '8.5').
